name: Feed on Fear
description:
Feed on Fear

This game was made for the 6th MMarmalade Game Jam. The theme was "Growing Fear". This game was made by Jan Mikusch, Max Tomio & Jeannette Schwalm.

Play as the monster in a child's nightmare and feed on their fear!  As the child's demon, you can see what it fears most at the moment, so make sure to use the appropriate actions in the right order to extract maximum fear! Either slam the ground, unleash a horrifying scream, terrifyingly reach for the child or even show them visions of getting a bad grade!!!

Controls

Use WASD or the arrow keys to choose the appropriate action. The faster you complete all actions, the more fear (points) you get!
